I think the reason they stepped up the fight scenes in The Winter Soldier was because one of the biggest complaints about The First Avenger was that Cap. didn't use his shield enough. So they thought "You fuckers want fight scenes? Here's some fight scenes that will blow your feeble minds!"

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e13028636872453b102700#post_54e13028636872453b102700
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e1302d63687249cdb31800#post_54e1302d63687249cdb31800
I'm starting to die because most people aren't getting the joke.

Joke explained:
[spoiler]Marisa, from Touhou, stole her signature attack "Master Spark" from Yuuka and the song is for Marisa's Master Spark which was stolen as well from Yuuka.  The joke is that Yuuka, the character, filed a copyright infringement on Marisa because it was stolen from her.[/spoiler]
